title: Final Touch Gin/Spritz Cocktail Glass (GG5041)
features: Specifically designed for gin cocktails. Authentic copa de balon style glass.
Large balloon shaped bowl helps to trap aromas for improved taste and plenty of room for ice.
Unique glass shape helps to visibly distinguish gin.
27 oz / 800 ml capacity - comfortably holds a large 13.5 oz / 400 ml cocktail.
Dimensions: 4.7 x 4.7 x 8.1 in (12 x 12 x 20.6 cm) | Capacity: 27 ounce (800 milliliter) | Material: Glass | Washing: Dishwasher safe (top rack)
